title: Valorization of hydro-distillate of fruit peels of Citrus paradisi macfad. Cultivar. Foster: Chemical profiling, antioxidant evaluation and in vitro and in silico enzyme inhibition studies
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Rameen Sajid, Zaheer Abbas, Mamona Nazir, Muhammad Saleem, Naheed Riaz, Muhammad Imran Tousif, Saba Tauseef, Gokhan Zengin, Abdullahi Ibrahim Uba, Abdullah Ijaz Hussain, Muhammad Shaiq Ali, Abeer Hashem, Khalid F. Almutairi, Graciela Dolores Avila-Quezada, Elsayed Fathi Abd_Allah
